comments.raw_text:
**Request Description** 
This is a request for Sharon to facilitate the remote iOS private sessions design sprint that took place April 6-9, 2020 with seven other members of the Firefox iOS team.

**Deadline** 
By the sprint dates: April 6-9, 2020

**Priority Level** 
Between 1-2

**Priority Level Description** 
The output from the sprint will be used to inform the Firefox iOS 2020 roadmap.

**Supporting Information**
PRD: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oGglMMa8_-O8_fB1xejZ7kIVx-ob27S3XYc7TFiEZOE/edit
Sprint Miro board: https://miro.com/welcomeonboard/MucEjb0RS1rB4hupjljdHt1V1ao0OePnbs6qSo9cdKpOZw94NBTZux3C5MmV3Ntu
Sprint re-cap (in progress): https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GMmO-BQCGW-uvJe7qfGyk2Jtawr9TwM2gtTUSXD3Dhc/edit
